name: Voyager v2
description:
You are descended from an adventurous race.
Your ancestors found ancient gems that gave them magical abilities, but the gems broke and you only have some of the magical abilities left. Will you be able to put them back together?

Developers:
- MCLegoMan [mclegoman.com]

 Texture Artists:
- MCLegoMan [mclegoman.com]

 Sound Artists: 
- LittleRobotSoundFactory [CC Attribution License | freesound.org]

Additional Notes:
This Mod was created for 1.18.x other versions of Minecraft may work but is not guaranteed.
